DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Cats Paint Set (8 Colors)
DescriptionData.Description:
Snazaroo presents Marcela Murad's The Cat Face Painting Kit, which includes the Face Painting Book of Cats by Murad and eight Snazaroo 2 ml face paints (Sparkle Yellow, Gold, White, Sparkle Orange, Sparkle Red, Orange, Bright Pink and Black). This is Murad's 2nd cat face painting book, and it has 50 original extraordinary yet simple cat face painting designs by one of the pioneers in the face painting world. It includes easy step-by step instructions will make kitty cat face painting a purr-fectly easy, from simple cat face painting to advanced cat face painting designs created by Murad, Jinny, Mark Reid, Sandy Hill, etc..
Snazaroo Face Paints are hypoallergenic and the world's safest face paints, meeting US FDA, Canadian, and European standards for cosmetic safety and the only face paint with a Child Toy Safety Rating. Snazaroo paint is non-toxic and easy to use face paint that is water-based, fragrance-free and wash off easily.
The Cat Face Painting Kit also comes with a sturdy plastic traveling case.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 8 color Snazaroo Cat Face Painting Kit will paint well over 50 faces
Non toxic, hypo allergenic and child friendly paint from Snazaroo
Comes with a sturdy carrying case
Gold,Sparkle Yellow, White, Sparkle Orage, Sparkle Orange, Sparkle Red, Orange, Bright Pink and Black
